bundle_parameters.author_list: Costa Sitja M.; Escalante Lopez A.; Valles R.

kernel.description: SPICE LSK file incorporating leapseconds up to $DATE, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE text PCK file containing constants from the $REPORT report, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE text PCK file containing mass parameters for planets and satellites from the JPL planetary ephemerides version DE431, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE binary PCK file containing the orientation of the Earth as a function of time for the given interval with reconstructed and predicted data, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE FK file containing surface definitions for the Digital Shape Kernels of Mercury, MPO, MMO, and MTM, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE FK file that provides MMO spacecraft, structures, instruments and sensors frames, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS) and JAXA.
SPICE FK file that provides MPO spacecraft, structures, instruments and sensors frames. Created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE FK file that provides MTM spacecraft, structures, instruments and sensors frames, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE FK file that provides frames used for science operations frames, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE FK file that provides BepiColombo science frames, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE FK kernel for the topocentric reference frames for the Deep Space Network (DSN) stations. This kernel was released on $DATE, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE FK file that makes the ITRF93 frame coincide with the Earth fixed reference frame, created by NAIF, JPL.
SPICE FK file that provides topocentric frames for the ESA Ground Stations, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).

SPICE FK file defining a number of cross-mission frames that could be used by any of the users of any of the ESA planetary missions and that are not ``built'' in the SPICE toolkit, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO Probing of Hermean Exosphere By Ultraviolet Spectroscopy (PHEBUS), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO BepiColombo Laser Altimeter (BELA), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MTM Monitoring Cameras (MCAMs), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO MErcury Radiometer and Thermal Infrared Spectrometer (MERTIS), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO Solar Intensity X-ray and particle Spectrometer (SIXS), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO Mercury Imaging X-ray Spectrometer (MIXS), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO Spectrometers and Imagers Integrated Observatory SYStem (SIMBIO-SYS), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MMO Mercury Sodium Atmosphere Spectral Image (MSASI), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS) and by JAXA.
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO Star Trackers (STR), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MMO Mercury Plasma Particle Experiment (MPPE), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS) and by JAXA.
SPICE IK file providing field-of-view (FOV) definitions for few MPO instruments and structures that do not have their own IKs, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).

SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO Search for Exospheric Refilling and Emitted Natural Abundances (SERENA), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE IK file providing optics, detector, and field-of-view (FOV) parameters for the MPO Mercury Gamma-Ray and Neutron Spectrometer (MGNS), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SCLK file containing time correlation data for the MPO on-board clock, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains position information for the BepicColombo science frames origins as defined in the science frames FK bc_sci_v$VERSION.tf, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that defines the position of the ESA ESTRACK ground stations in the topocentric frame defined in the ESTRACK FK estrack_v$VERSION.bsp, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains MPO spacecraft operational Sun centric ephemeris for the Cruise, phase. This file contains both reconstructed and predicted data, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains MTM spacecraft structures positions, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains Mercury Magnetosphetic Spacecraft (MMO) relative position with respect to MPO in order to bind MMO to the MPO trajectory, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains MPO spacecraft structures positions involved in the Schulte Vector calculations, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains ephemeris data for NASA DSN stations relative to the terrestrial reference frame label 'ITRF93'. This file was released the 14th of July 2005, created by NAIF, JPL.

SPICE SPK file that contains MPO spacecraft center-of-gravity (CoG) as delivered by ESOC Flight Dynamics. It is important to note that the MPO trajectory SPK files provide ephemeris information for MPO (-121) and refer to the CoG. This file provides provides the position of MPO_SPACECRAFT (-121000), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains MPO spacecraft structures positions, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains MPO spacecraft structures positions involved in the Schulte Vector computations, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains MMO spacecraft structures positions, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file that contains Mercury Transfer Module (MTM) relative position with respect to MPO in order to bind MTM to the MPO trajectory, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE SPK file containing JPL planetary ephemerides version DE432, created by the Solar System Dynamics group (SSD), JPL.
SPICE CK file that contains canonical orientation of the MTM Solar Arrays frames (zero rotation), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains canonical orientation of the MPO Medium Gain Antenna frames (zero rotation), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains canonical orientation of the MPO Solar Array frames (zero rotation), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains canonical orientation of the MPO High Gain Antenna frames (zero rotation), created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains measured orientation of the MPO High Gain Antenna frame during the cruise phase, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains MPO measured attitude as provided by the quaternions on the housekeeping telemetry during the cruise phase, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains measured orientation of the MPO Medium Gain Antenna Frame during the cruise phase, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains measured orientation of the MTM Solar Arrays frames during the cruise phase, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file containing fixed rotation between the MTM and MPO frames covering cruise, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains measured orientation of the MPO Medium Gain Antenna Frame during the cruise phase, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains measured orientation of the MPO Solar Array frames during the cruise phase, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file containing fixed rotation between the MMO and MPO frames covering cruise, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains MTM Solar Electric Propulsion (SEP) frame providing information of engine's turn-on/off times, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE CK file that contains the default orientation of the MAG Boom, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).

SPICE CK file that contains MPO predicted attitude for short term planning and as commanded to the S/C in the operations loop. The source data is originated by Flight Dynamics, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MTM S/C bus shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MTM Solar Array +X shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MPO S/C High Gain Antenna shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MOSIF structure shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MTM Solar Array -X shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MPO S/C Medium Gain Antenna shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MPO Solar Array shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MMO S/C bus shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE DSK file that contains MPO S/C bus shape model, created by the ESA SPICE Service (ESS).
SPICE MK file listing kernels for the entire mission duration, created by the ESA SPICE Service.
